Vignesh Venkateswaran

Software Engineer at AWS

Seattle, Washington

I’m Vignesh Venkateswaran, a software engineer in Seattle, working on building the global internet's infrastructure at Amazon Web Services.

Prior, I worked at Twitter as a senior product designer and design lead of Moments. I spent 3 years at Foursquare , designing the check-in flow, tip creation, and a variety of other content creation experiences, and interned at Nike World HQ in Portland on the Nike+ product. I completed the 18th grade at the School of Visual Arts, receiving my masters in Interaction Design. While there, I did a project visualizing fitness tracking data in NYC that culminated with me designing a full page spread for WIRED UK.

I'm rarely without my camera and keep a photo journal of my adventures.
